alert.note: Alert for Butler (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 25 at 2:51AM CST until November 26 at 3:00AM CST by NWS Wichita
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM CST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Moderate to heavy snow at times, with a slight chance of freezing rain and sleet. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 8 inches, greatest over northern Butler county. Ice accumulation will be little if any. * WHEN...This morning until 3 AM CST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...If traveling, consider departing your destination before the snow starts, or delaying your departure until the snow ends.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
